timeline.author: Electroid

replies.bodyText: We tested this format and it did not look the best, due to overtime being in bold, and that causing the : to also be bolded
replies.author: Pablete1234

timeline.bodyText: Overtime! The timer will start after the tie is broken
timeline.author: Electroid
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -111,6 +111,9 @@ broadcast.matchStart = The match has started!
 
 broadcast.startCancel = Match start cancelled
 
+broadcast.overtime = The match was tied, overtime has started, once the tie is broken time will start ticking

timeline.bodyText: If there is no winner after {0}, the match will be tied.
timeline.author: Electroid
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -111,6 +111,9 @@ broadcast.matchStart = The match has started!
 
 broadcast.startCancel = Match start cancelled
 
+broadcast.overtime = The match was tied, overtime has started, once the tie is broken time will start ticking
+broadcast.overtime.limit = If the match is still tied after {0} it will result in a tie.

timeline.message:
Modify overtime info messages
